channel.title: Contact us on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Contact us on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: FO - Contact us - Mailto
item.description: FO - Contact us - Mailto Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 9.1.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5069 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/hummingbird/05_contactUs/01_checkMailtoLink.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Scroll down to footer > In “Store information” section > Click on Email address below(Shop E-mail address) A mail window will open and you will be able to send an email to the shop email adsress

item.title: FO - Contact us - Add attachment
item.description: FO - Contact us - Add attachment Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 8.0.x, 9.1.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5070 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/hummingbird/05_contactUs/04_addAttachment.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > In footer, in on “Our company” section >Click on “Contact us” link Contact us form is displayed : * Subject fiels * Email address * Attachement * Message Click on Contact Us button on header > In contact form click “Choose file” > Choose your file and upload it The file name is now displayed in the placeholder of Attachment Fill the form Form is displayed with your data Add attachment > Click “Choose File” > Choose your file The file name is now displayed in the placeholder of Attachment Choose a file with extension .

item.title: FO - Contact us : Send message from contact us page with customer logged in
item.description: FO - Contact us : Send message from contact us page with customer logged in Details Component : Core Status : Automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5071 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/hummingbird/05_contactUs/02_sendMessageWithCustomer.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Log into your customer account created from the pre-condition step You are logged into your customer account Go to FO > In footer, click on Our Company > Contact us * The contact form is displayed

item.title: FO - Contact us - Send message while logged out
item.description: FO - Contact us - Send message while logged out Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 8.0.x, 9.1.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5072 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/hummingbird/05_contactUs/03_sendMessageAsAnonymous.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > In footer, click on Our Company > Contact us Contact us form is well displayed Fill the form > Send Message “Invalid email address.” is displayed Fill the form > Send Message “Invalid email address.
